title: Ride in Peace Max Kullaway: 333 Fab
content:
It is with a heavy heart that we have to share the news that Max Kullaway from 333 Fab passed away after spending years fighting cancer. His wife posted on Facebook this morning announcing the sad news. Weâ€™d like to extend warm thoughts and love to all who knew Max and to all of his customers, his legacy now lives with you. Ride in peace, buddy.

See you on the other side of the pass.

xo

If you can and would like to support his family, you can at this GoFundMe.
author: prolly
